text.div:
Nutrient Modifier Codes

NutrientModifier : Codes for types of nutrient that is being modified such as carbohydrate or sodium. This value set includes codes from SNOMED CT where concept is-a 226355009 (Nutrients(substance)), and the concepts for Sodium, Potassium and Fluid. It is provided as a suggestive example.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    33463005Fluid
    39972003Sodium
    88480006Potassium
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 226355009 (Nutrients)

It is provided as a suggestive example.
